review: LOVE this Roku stick! So easy to set up, easy to use. LOVE the setup of Netflix on this. I don't know what more to say, I just am so happy with this purchase.I recently received a request to answer a question about what is included in the box to power the stick... some of the wrong answers astounded me! So let me set the record straight. This comes with a microUSB cable. One end is micro, the other is USB. The micro part goes into the stick...it MUST to get power. The other end can go into the usb outlet on your TV if you 1. have an outlet and 2. It provides enough power. Otherwise, also included with it is a power adapter similar to those you use for your smart phones and tablets. On end plugs into the outlet in the wall the other end accepts a USB cable. ALL IS INCLUDED in a new purchase. If you buy used I can't make any promises.
author: Amazon Customer "Joey's Mommy"
